articles.title: Bayern Munich bosses want to hold on to Thomas Tuchel, Hansi Flick not currently an option - Bavarian Football Works
articles.description: A change does not appear to be imminent.
articles.content:
Despite the current turmoil and mounting losses, Bayern Munichs bosses are keen on keeping Thomas Tuchel as head coach of the team. 
According to a report from Bild (as captured by @iMiaSanMia), the… [+987 chars]
